ashoka somarathna - (adhyakshaka si. ayi. si the upadeshana sewa pudgalika samagama, hitapu wyapthi ansha pradhani shri lanka the paryeshanayathanaya, hitapu niyojya samanyadhikari - wyapthi (kuda the wathu sanwardhana adhikariya) padma kumari agalawaththa (aacharini mahanuwara wariyapola shri sumangala widuhala) ge aadaraniya swami purushaya wuda, himesha (si. ayi. si aushadha samagama) purandi (shishya - mahanuwara hilwud balika widuhala) yana ayage aadaraniya piyanan wuda, ashoka somarathna mahatha abhawapraptha wiya.

rawin sahodarayatath bohoma sthuthiyi prathicharayata.sahodaraya kiwwa wagema oya aagamika prakasha walata man pilithuru bandinna yanne na.mokada anthawadin nikarune prashna athikaraganna puluwan.namuth mehedi dilipa sahodaraya waradi nam niwaradi karanna kiyapu hindath ohuta pahadili kalama danuwath weyi yana wishwashayen thama man me lipiya liwwe.
